thread.title_full: RI Student Loan Authority/College Planning Center of RI reviewed by Laurisa

author: Laurisa
title: Laurisa
text: Very reassuring, second time around. Such a great resource, very nice patient, knowledgeable people there to help you navigate all the college paperwork. Thank you!!!
